name: ghost-kraken
description: Kraken tests for Ghost 3.41.1 local instance

scripts.ghost-start: npm run ghost-remove-db && ghost start --no-setup-linux-user -d ghost-local/
scripts.ghost-stop: ghost stop --no-setup-linux-user -d ghost-local/ && npm run ghost-remove-db
scripts.test: npm run ghost-start && kraken-node run && npm run ghost-stop && rm -rf reports/ .kraken

author: Luis Miguel Guzman Perez
